column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The whole experience was wonderful.    I may be a bit slanted in my opinion as it was our 3rd anniversery and I just love my partner so much.    But the waiter eric was patient attentive and informative.     Started with cocktails bavettes punch super .     Appetizer duck tureen I think that's the name
column2: delicious.     Sides elote style corn ( I'm not a fan of elotes)  these were delicious.   Aged bone in rib eye and some fabulous chicken dish .    Ambience was lovely.   Even patrons were so nice
column3: two ladies next to us randomly engaged in conversation
column4: they were delightful as well.     Can not reccomend Bavettes any higher it was just amazing.
